title: Input-Driven Multi-counter Automata
venue: International Conference on Implementation and Application of Automata

tldr.text: It is possible to prove a proper counter hierarchy depending on the alphabet size, and the undecidability of the emptiness problem is derived for input-driven two-counter automata.
